page.title: 18Transport Mexborough/Denaby
page.content: Denaby/Mexborough is well situated for rail,{canal}and road{communications,} and the nearest airport is one hour away at Manchester. Airports are used mainly for holiday travel.{Coal} produced in Cadeby pit can be moved quickly by road,rail or barge very easily to any area of Britain or Europe.Perishable food can be brought here by rail or the motorway from the ports. It would take a matter of days on a barge but by road it would only take a couple of hours.Even London is only two hours away by high speed train. Local{transport}by bus is very cheap. We need cheap transport for people going to work, school and shopping but rates as a consequence are higher. If you are travelling over three miles on a school journey the council usually give you a bus pass providing you are under sixteen.
